title: Interpretation of guava in a dream: seeing yellow, green, white guava fruit

preview.html: Contents: A dream of guava for a single woman. A guava tree for a married woman. Ripe and spoiled guava juice. She dreamed of eating guava for pregnant women who buy guava. The meaning of a dream about guava. It indicates sustenance and goodness that the Lord has gained and success in the affairs of his life. If the guava fruits are green, then seeing them indicates the disappearance of some of the differences that occurred in If someone sees that he is eating a white guava in a dream, this vision will indicate that peace, tension, and comfort will disappear and circumstances will change for the better. If it is If the guava fruit is spoiled and someone eats it in a dream, then seeing it indicates a lot of rumors and gossip that the dreamer has fallen into and some people have been stabbed in real life. Whoever sees a guava tree in a dream, it indicates success in matters of life and the good that the dreamer attains and the progress and success that the dreamer achieves. In his life. Seeing a guava being picked from its tree in a dream, the vision indicates a peaceful and happy life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating and eating the fruits of a guava, his vision indicates distress, worry, and relief that the dreamer comes from after suffering from it. Interpretation of guava in a pregnant woman’s dream. A pregnant woman who sees Guava in her dream indicates the ease and success of pregnancy and childbirth, God willing. A pregnant woman who sees guava fruits in her dream indicates the safety of her fetus and that she will give birth well and without any obstacle. Interpretation of buying guava in a dream. As for buying guava in a dream, the dream indicates the disappearance of worries And anxiety, change of circumstances, semi-comfort and good coming to the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying a guava fruit, his vision indicates speeding up in achieving some useful things for the dreamer. Buying a guava in a dream means that the dreamer is in a hurry in some matters, but his fears Interpretation of guava juice in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking guava juice, then his vision indicates the best of his affairs and good behavior. Also, seeing a drink of guava juice in a dream indicates the departure of anxiety and the nearness of the gulf, God willing, and it also indicates the dreamer’s livelihood. Drinking guava juice in a dream is evidence of ease. And justice and relief of things. Interpretation of a guava tree in a dream. Seeing a tree and eating green, yellow and white guava in a dream indicates good things and livelihood that the dreamer will gain, because seeing the fruit in a dream generally means sustenance and seeing guava fruit in a dream indicates the end of conflicts and their resolution. Whoever saw a guava tree in his dream Seeing it means the livelihood and blessing that the dreamer will obtain, and stopping quarrels and disagreements and resolving them. It also indicates the success and ambition achieved by the person who had the vision. The guava tree in a dream is correcting problems between spouses, resolving disputes between them, and providing livelihood and success. Interpretation of green guava in a dream. Seeing guava turning green in The dream indicates

title: Interpretation of brushing teeth in a dream for a single woman, a pregnant woman, a married woman, and a man

preview.html: Today we learn about the interpretation of brushing teeth in a dream from the point of view of scholars, the most famous of whom is the scholar Ibn Sirin. Many people when they wake up want to know the meanings and symbols of dreams, especially if they are related to the Sunnah of the Prophet. The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: If my nation were not so difficult, I would have ordered them to use toothpicks in every prayer. This shows the importance of using the toothpick, which is a tool for cleaning the teeth and getting rid of the debris stuck in it. What are the secrets and symbols behind seeing the toothpick in a dream? We learn about them through this article that presents, O Encyclopedia, follow us. Interpretation of the gift of a toothpick in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that someone gives him A toothpick as a gift in a dream, then this dream indicates that there is good news that he will hear soon, God willing. An unmarried young man who dreams that another person gives him a toothpick as a gift. This dream is one of the good dreams that indicates that the dreamer is about to enter a new stage in His life and that he will meet good people who will help him obey Almighty God and take his hand in the straight path. Interpretation of seeing a questioner in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The siwak in a dream shows family unity and cohesion. The toothpick in the dream also symbolizes adherence to the Sunnah of the Prophet. The siwak in a dream indicates that goodness will happen and that goodness will happen to the pioneer, in addition to the abundance of sustenance. Likewise, the use of the siwak In a dream, it symbolizes the good treatment with which the dreamer treats others. Among the good dreams is that a person sees in his dream that he is using a stick, and after using it, blood comes out of his mouth. This dream symbolizes that the dreamer is committing some sins and disobedience and wants to repent to God Almighty, and he must repent sincerely and God Almighty helps him. A person has lost his job and is looking for a source of livelihood and sees in a dream that someone is giving him a toothpick and feels joy in taking the stick from him. This dream means that the dreamer will get a good job opportunity, and it also indicates that the new job will force him to change his financial circumstances for the better. Meaning of brushing Teeth in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Imam Al-Osaimi believes that the toothpick in a dream has many interpretations, and among these interpretations is: Whoever sees someone giving him a gift other than you, then this dream indicates that a happy occasion will happen to him, and if the dreamer is not married, whether he is a young man or a girl, then this dream It means that he will find what suits him. A life partner soon, God willing. Whoever sees in a dream that he is distributing toothpicks to a group of family members and relatives, this dream means that the dreamer honors his parents and enjoys good relations with his family and relatives. A wife who dreams that she is giving a toothpick to her husband and the woman is pregnant, this dream indicates That God Almighty will give her a male child that will satisfy her eye. If a person is far from the path of God and sees a toothpick in a dream, then this dream symbolizes that God Almighty opens the door of repentance for him and calls on him to refrain from disobedience and sins, and to return to the path of God, to perform acts of obedience and abstain from sins. Evil. Interpretation of seeing a toothbrush in a dream for a single woman symbolizes

title: Interpretation of a dream about a hat in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a hat in a dream: Seeing a red hat in a dream is considered a warning sign for the dreamer about some wrong actions that he is performing and needs to be corrected. As for whoever sees a hat in a dream, this indicates the pride, glory, and goodness that concerns the dreamer. Whoever sees in a dream a hat that hides facial features, then This dream shows the dreamer’s desire for calm, reconciliation with himself, and freedom from internal conflict. Seeing a sports hat in a dream means that he is a social person who integrates with people and is characterized by tolerance and integration with others. Seeing a hat that protects from the sun indicates that the man has complete control over the woman in terms of Her emotions and behavior. In general, seeing a hat in a dream shows the goodness that prevails over the dreamer, and taking it off in a dream or losing it is something that does not bode well. Seeing that hat belonging to a prisoner in a dream indicates how brave the dreamer is and his entry into dangers and moments of distress and danger, but This time, his courage will not help him and may turn against him. The hat in a dream indicates the fulfillment of what the dreamer desires and the happiness that dominates him. Whoever sees a miner’s hat in a dream, it can be a sign of acquiring wealth. Interpretation of seeing a hat for a single, unmarried girl who dreams that she wears A hat, as this dream indicates her emotional stability and that she will get married soon. A girl wearing a hat in a dream indicates that she is a girl of good character and has a good reputation. If we see a clean hat in a dream about a single girl, this indicates her academic excellence. A new hat indicates that she is entering a new field of work. Or it may be a positive change in her life, such as marriage. And whoever sees in a dream that her lover is the one wearing a hat in the dream, then this dream shows the extent of the connection and love that binds them. Interpretation of seeing a hat for a married woman: A married woman who sees that she is wearing a hat in a dream, this solution shows the happiness that She lives with her husband. With a dirty hat in a dream, this dream indicates the presence of some marital disputes and problems or with one of her children. Seeing a new hat in a dream is a sign of kindness and happy skin or wealth that will come to her husband. A hat in a dream shows the woman’s status with her husband and that she enjoys good luck. Interpretation of seeing a hat in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing a hat in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates ease and ease of childbirth. A dirty hat in a dream indicates problems that she faces during pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing a clean hat in a dream means that she is in good condition and that she and her fetus are in good health. Therefore, we presented ​​For you all possible interpretations of seeing a hat in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about laughter for single people

preview.html: Or making fun of bad visions, the interpretation of which differs from the interpretation of seeing laughter or smiling calmly and reverently, and this we will learn in the article and explain to you more from our translator. Interpretation of seeing a dream of laughter in a dream about a single girl: If the girl sees in her dream that she is sitting with her lover or fiancé and they are laughing together. The vision shows that their wedding date is approaching, and God knows best. On the contrary, if the girl sees that she is laughing a lot and loudly with her fiancé or lover. The vision is not promising, which indicates the emergence of problems between them that lead to separation and abandonment. If an unmarried girl sees herself laughing in a dream, then this It means that she will hear good news. If the girl sees that he is laughing sarcastically. This indicates that she will face a lot of problems in her life or that she is actually facing some problems. Also, seeing the same girl laughing hard without stopping. The vision shows that she is suffering from a problem that is an obstacle in Her life does not know how to solve it or get rid of it. And if an unmarried woman sees that she is laughing in a dream, because she heard good news. The vision shows what she saw, and soon she will hear good news that will bring joy to her heart. As for seeing single people laughing or smiling outside the house on the street. It shows Seeing how much overwhelming happiness you will have soon. Seeing an unmarried woman laughing in a dream may be unpleasant dreams, such as seeing an unmarried woman who died from intense laughter. It states that the visionary will prefer life to the afterlife, committing immoral acts, God forbid, and satisfying her lustful desires. Perhaps not all visions of laughter portend good for individuals. The vision indicates the passage of a period of sadness and sorrow for the insight. But soon things change and she returns to her calm, problem-free life. See also: Interpretation of dreams about laughing with relatives. Interpretation of seeing a dream about laughter in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees in her dream that she is laughing or smiling innocently, then the vision indicates that she hears good news. If a married woman sees that she is laughing without a sound or laughing in a dream, and there are problems and disagreements between her and her husband. The vision heralds the end of these problems and the enjoyment of a calm and stable married life. As for seeing a married woman laughing loudly in a dream to the point of laughter. The vision indicates her suffering in her married life because of the problems she faces with her husband and children. Perhaps seeing a married woman laughing loudly and courageously in a dream. It indicates the presence of problems that her husband is suffering from, which may be problems. At work or financial problems. But if a married woman sees in a dream, she laughs loudly and continuously, and before she sleeps, she cries. The vision shows her husband’s betrayal, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman in a dream laughing or smiling shyly in a place devoid of people. The vision indicates that God He will bless her with a good son. It applies after a long wait, or the vision indicates goodness and nourishment in general. But if a married woman sees that she is laughing and mocking the worshipers inside the mosque, then the vision is not good, which indicates sadness and sorrow due to the sad news. As for the vision

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a car driving in the front seat in a complete dream?

preview.html: The Hadota website offers you a vision to interpret riding a car in the front seat and seeing the car in a complete dream means a new life for the pioneer. Dreams often confuse everyone. Driving a full car in a dream is a sign of a change in circumstances for the better. Thinking about traveling and if the viewer is frightened and afraid to ride a car, then to me this means reckless behavior or a hasty decision. What is the interpretation of riding a car in the front seat according to Ibn Sirin? The respected scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says that driving a car in a dream completely indicates the death of a person Who sees a health condition. What is the interpretation of seeing a car driving in the front seat in general, which indicates changes and surprises in the dreamer’s life for the better. Seeing a car driving in the front seat can mean that you will do some reckless things that you will regret. Seeing a car if it collides with a person While driving, this indicates the bad condition of its owner, differences and sorrows. What is the interpretation of seeing a car driving in the front seat of a bowling woman? If a woman sees in her dream that she is riding in a car with someone, this indicates the approach of moving to a new life with this person. Also, Seeing a girl riding in the car next to her lover and in the front seat indicates the existence of a formal relationship between her and her lover. Ibn Sirin says that if a girl sees that she is riding in the car with her lover in a complete dream, this indicates that she will get married soon, God willing. And seeing the girl is setting herself free. While driving in the car in the front seat indicates the collapse of all the conflicts she is going through in her life. What is the interpretation of a married woman in the front seat of a car? If a married woman sees that she is riding a car in the front seat, this indicates a major shift in her life for the better. Also Driving a car in a dream for a married girl indicates good conditions and ample living that she will live in. If a married woman sees that she is driving a full car in a dream and her husband is sitting next to her, this means that her husband stands by her in adversity. But seeing herself riding in a car with an unknown person other than her husband indicates Differences and misfortunes in the life of a married girl. What is the interpretation of seeing a divorced woman in the front seat of a car? The interpretation of seeing a car in a complete dream for a divorced woman indicates that she is on the right path. Also, seeing a car driven by her ex-husband in a complete dream indicates goodness, justice, and the end of problems. Driving a black car in a complete dream is a wonderful indication that you will get rid of worries and sorrows. What is the interpretation of seeing a car driving in the front seat of a man? If a man sees in his dream that he is driving a car with another girl next to his wife, this indicates betrayal and neglect. Also, seeing a car Driving in the front seat indicates the collapse of sorrows and illusions in a man's life. Alternatively, seeing an elderly man driving a car while sitting in the front seat indicates an upcoming marriage. If a man sees that he is driving a car in a complete dream, it is considered that it could indicate a leadership position Who will get

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a bribe in a dream in full?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you an interpretation of a dream about bribery. It is known that bribery means receiving or distributing money to buy something that does not qualify for bribery and is evidence of corruption and its spread in society. Seeing a bribe in a complete dream happens to many people in a complete dream, so, dear God, I have collected it. The whole point is to see a bribe in a dream in full, as well as in the dream of a man and a woman among the great scholars of dream interpretation and visions. It is interesting to know the interpretation of seeing a bribe, you should read the article. Why dream of a bribe? Seeing a bribe in a dream means that a person performs many actions Shameful things that cause him fear and panic when exposed to them. Also, seeing a complete bribe in a dream is a sign of moral decadence and indicates that the dreamer will commit many sins. Seeing someone taking a bribe in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s weakness in the face of many temptations, and he must He repents and returns from these actions. Bribing someone in a dream is full of visions that indicate worries and problems, and the dreamer enters a period full of sadness. See also: Why do you dream of seeing theft in a dream in full? Why dream of bribery? The dreamer sees himself in a dream in full, when he takes a bribe from someone he does not know , also indicates that receiving money from orphans is prohibited. title: Interpretation of a dream about flowers in a dream about Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about flowers in a dream Al-Asamit Interpretation of dreams Flowers in a dream indicate happiness and joy if they are white. Dreaming about yellow flowers in a dream is evidence of optimism, but if the flowers are damaged, this indicates a disease that the dreamer suffers from. Blue flowers in a dream are evidence of security and stability. As for the dream With flowers on trees in a dream, it is a sign of kindness and good offspring. Interpretation of a dream about flowers in one dream. Seeing a dream about flowers. Beautiful colors are evidence of happy news and abundant nourishment that this girl will receive in the near future. But if the girl sees if he buys flowers in a dream, this indicates the approaching date of Wedding. A girl’s dream of red flowers is a sign of happiness and marriage to a young man she loves. Interpretation of a dream about flowers in a married woman’s dream for Al-Asami. Interpretation of a dream about flowers for a married woman in a dream is evidence of sadness if they are black. Seeing jasmine flowers in a dream is a sign of achieving goals and recovering from diseases. Red flowers prove stability in married life. Interpretation of a dream about flowers in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing flowers in a dreamWomen Being pregnant is evidence of easy childbirth. If he sees a flower, this indicates the birth of a female. If you dream that you are buying flowers, this means that you will hear good news. If you see a flower, this indicates the birth of a female. Flowers cut from trees in a dream, this is a sign of anxiety and sadness that will happen to her in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about flowers in a man’s dream If a person sees in a dream that he is picking flowers, this means that he will be exposed to some problems. Picking flowers suggests strength and status. As for the single person who sees Flowers in a dream are evidence of his relationship with a girl he has wanted for a long time. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hair cut in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hair being cut in a dream according to the great Arab translators and scholars in interpreting dreams and visions, because hair is what gives a woman a beautiful external body, as everyone wonders about the meaning of the interpretation of a dream about cutting long or short hair, and it is not the same thing from one person to another, It is certain that cutting hair in a dream refers to many different meanings, and below is the interpretation of a dream about shaving for a married, single, pregnant, man. Interpretation of a dream about seeing hair cut by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained it. Seeing a haircut in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s desire to untie everything that binds him. Seeing hair in general indicates that the debt will be paid soon. Beautiful hair in a dream is a sign of an improvement in the dreamer’s situation. Also, cutting hair in a dream indicates a noticeable change in one’s life, whether in the practical field or in the romantic field. Seeing a hand passing through Another person's hair indicates the dreamer's desire to get close to that person. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing hair cut in a dream indicates the dreamer's desire to change some of his life's assumptions and get rid of negative thoughts. Also, cutting hair in a dream indicates that there are things It will disappoint the dreamer. As for plucking hair in a dream, it is a sign of financial problems. Seeing hair growing in different places means that the dreamer will be affected by sadness and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about a man’s haircut: Seeing a man cutting his hair in a dream and being satisfied with it is evidence of his desire to get rid of All his worries and sorrows in his life and from marital strife. As for the man who sees himself shaving his hair in a dream, this indicates that he will face many problems. As for seeing his wife shaving her hair in a dream, this is evidence of the existence of love and friendship between them. Seeing a man he does not know cutting his hair is a sign of accumulation Debts on him and his financial problems. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a married woman. A married woman who sees herself cutting her hair and feels happy is evidence that she has given birth to a beautiful child, because cutting hair with a feeling of satisfaction is evidence of joy and pleasure. When she sees a married woman cutting her hair and becoming beautiful, this indicates However, she will enjoy happiness in her life. Seeing a husband cutting his wife’s hair indicates that there is a problem between them, which will lead to the dissolution of the marital relationship. Seeing a married woman happy with her hair in a dream is evidence that she will get many good things for her soon. Seeing a married woman who She did not give birth in a dream while cutting her hair is evidence of many problems occurring in childbirth, and she must be patient in this regard. Seeing a married woman as a stranger cutting her hair in a dream means the emergence of many problems, problems, and heartaches, but they will disappear from them. As these appear The vision is her reluctance and satisfaction with her married life. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman cutting her hair in a dream is evidence that the pain of pregnancy is over. Seeing hair being cut and growing in a dream means that she will give birth to a baby girl. As for cutting hair in a pregnant woman’s dream and shortening it, it means that she She will give birth to a child

title: Interpretation of a dream about getting three appointments in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about getting three dates in a dream: To reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about getting three dates in a dream: Seeing three dates in a dream may mean that the dreamer will have good offspring. Seeing yourself eating three dates in a dream may indicate Good things that the dreamer may gain during this time. In the event that one sees that he has acquired three dates in a dream, this may indicate positive changes that are occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period. Seeing three dates in a dream could indicate the good that will come to the dreamer during this time. Time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting a piece of meat in a dream: If you see yourself eating a piece of raw meat in a dream, this may indicate the abundance of sustenance and halal money that the dreamer will acquire during this period. Seeing yourself eating a piece of meat in a dream may indicate It indicates a great benefit that the dreamer may obtain during this time, thanks to God. If one sees that he obtained a piece of meat in a dream, this may indicate getting rid of the corruption that he may encounter during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of obtaining A piece of meat in a dream indicates the abundant benefits that the dreamer will reap during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of receiving a white dress from the dead in a dream: It is possible that a dream of the dead giving the living a white dress in a dream indicates the dreamer’s long life, and God knows best. It may indicate Dreaming of a white dress from a dead person indicates good things that may come to the dreamer at that time. Seeing a white dress taken from the dead in a dream may indicate that the dreamer bears a lot of responsibility for that period. If one sees that he wore a white dress in a dream among The dead, this may indicate the dreamer’s expected happiness during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of receiving three eggs in a dream: It is possible that the vision of receiving three eggs in a dream indicates the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires and dreams. A person’s dream of receiving three eggs could indicate Achieving the successes that the dreamer was trying to achieve. Seeing three eggs taken in a dream may indicate abundant goodness that the dreamer has acquired by God’s grace. If one sees that he has obtained three eggs in a dream, this may indicate marital happiness that the dreamer was enjoying in That time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about removing a house from its owner in a dream: Seeing selling a house in a dream may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period. Seeing taking the house and turning it into a mosque may be a sign of changes occurring in the life of the dreamer in that period. days. Whoever sees in a dream that he entered a new house and took it from his family along with the furniture, may indicate the changes that occur to the dreamer in a major way during those days. It is possible that the dream of taking a house from its owner indicates good health enjoyed by the dreamer during this period, by God. I know. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of the name Youssef in a dream. Characteristics of the bearer of the name Youssef

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the name Yusuf for single women, married women, pregnant women, and divorcees if they give birth to a child named Yusuf, according to Ibn Sirin and others. The meaning of the name Yusuf. Ibn Manzur mentioned in Lisan al-Arab that it has three languages: Yusuf, Yusuf, and Yusuf, and Hamza also spoke in it, and the Prophet Yusuf, “peace be upon him,” is one of the sons of the Prophet Jacob. ten. A caravan and sold it to the king’s minister, who in turn presented his wife Zuleikha well, and she loved him and became close to him, but he avoided her, which led to his imprisonment. Then he visited the Pharaoh of Egypt, the guardian of Egypt’s economic affairs, and may God increase Yusuf Al-Ansari (he may be from Al-Asif or Al-Wasif). Characteristics of the bearer of the name. Youssef is characterized by excessive activity when she was young, so that she does not calm down and settle down. He is intelligent and shows his wisdom since childhood. He has a broad chest, but you cannot calm him down if he gets angry. He is humble with people, but he loves excellence in behavior and lifestyle. A bold personality on the right. He has been an official since childhood. He excelled at his job, even if he mainly worked in something other than his specialty. Interpretation of the name Joseph in a dream. The name Joseph is of Jewish origin and is mentioned in the Torah for the story of the Prophet Joseph, son of Jacob, peace be upon him. It means: “God gives and multiplies” or “God increases and blesses,” and in a dream it is one of the names that indicate good news and good deeds. The name Joseph in interpretation is one of the names that most expresses the descent of good deeds. It appears in some well-known dream interpretation books: The name Joseph in a dream indicates an abundance of food. It was said: Whoever saw this name in a dream or heard it, then mingled with a friend, or escaped the temptation, or escaped distress or sadness. Interpretation of the name Joseph in one dream. To deduce the meaning of this name in the dream of an unmarried girl or girl, we have to exclude some people who You may see them unmarried in the dream and they bear this name, such as: (grandfather, father, brother, fiancé, lover...) All of these do not refer to their names in the vision with any meaning or significance, but the adjective prevails over the noun. When a person is in The dream is closely related to or related to the dreamer, we infer the meaning of his appearance in the dream through other factors such as appearance, behavior, speech or mind. But if the person named Joseph is far from freedom in relationship or kinship, then it is the meaning of his name that will ultimately give us the general meaning To see. These people are: the grocer or the shop owner in the neighborhood in which you live. If his name is Joseph and the girl sees him in the dream, then it is most likely that the dream expresses livelihood or profit, especially if the girl or the girl saw in the dream, as if the grocer or merchant was giving her Good things you want. Sometimes some of these visions come true or come true in relation to the quality of the friend associated with the name Youssef (Youssef Al-Siddiq). The same interpretation and expression applies to a stranger whose appearance or name no one remembers except the person having the vision, or the person he met by chance while awake several or several years ago, Or someone he knew briefly in the past. For this person, the meaning of his appearance in a dream may be related to a cherished desire that may soon come true... Do not forget that the word Joseph in the Arabic language
